text:
Need Chloe Lewis for Mecca campaign. Budget around $11,480, looking for 3 x Instagram post, 3 x TikTok video, 3 x Pinterest pin. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 5 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $11,480 budget

Need to confirm: usage rights
